steps.conclusion: Four of the six course titles are in English instead of Spanish, violating the explicit requirement to write titles in the user’s language and only add an english_title when translating non-English titles.

The icon for the Branding course is incorrect (`tabler-brand-jenkins` is a Jenkins icon, not a branding symbol); the english_title for Branding duplicates the Spanish title without providing new information.

Translate all course titles into Spanish (e.g. “Gestión de Redes Sociales” instead of “Social Media Management”), choose appropriate branding-related icons (e.g. `tabler-brand-adobe`), and consider adding a course on Social Media Advertising or Paid Social Media to cover promotion strategies more directly.
